name: Sedum acre
Relationship: Compare: MUCUNA URENS (hemorrhoidal diathesis and diseases depending thereon); SEDUM TELEPHIUM (uterine hemorrhages, also for bowels and rectum; MENORRHAGIA, ESPECIALLY AT CLIMACTERIC); SEDUM REPENS - S. ALPESTRE - (CANCER; specific action on abdominal organs; pain, loss of strength.
details: Hemorrhoidal pains, like those of anal fissures; constricting pains, worse few hours after stool. FISSURES.Scorbutic conditions; ulcers, intermittent fever. Sexual irritability, relieves irritation of nerve centers and gives rest.
